hero.title: Genie 3 - Free AI Text-to-Video Generator
hero.description: Unlock your creativity with Genie 3, a powerful and free AI text-to-video generator. Easily transform your text into stunning videos in minutes. No design skills required! Get your free Genie 3 experience today.

introduce.name: introduce
introduce.title: Genie 3: The Future of AI Video Generation
introduce.label: About Genie 3
introduce.description: Genie 3 is a revolutionary AI text-to-video generator that leverages advanced machine learning to transform text into stunning videos. Our powerful Genie 3 engine meticulously analyzes your input and generates corresponding visuals, music, and voiceovers.

items.title: AI-Powered Animation
items.description: Genie 3 uses cutting-edge AI to analyze your images and create smooth, natural motion sequences.

items.title: Cinematic Quality
items.description: Generate professional-grade videos with camera movements, depth effects, and realistic animations.

items.title: Lightning Fast
items.description: Transform your images into stunning videos in just seconds, not hours of manual editing.

benefit.name: benefit
benefit.title: Unlock Your Creativity with the Free Genie 3 Generator
benefit.label: Benefits
benefit.description: The true power of Genie 3 lies in its accessibility. We firmly believe that everyone should have the tools to express their creativity, which is why we offer a free Genie 3 version with no hidden costs.

items.title: Advanced AI Technology
items.description: Genie 3 leverages state-of-the-art neural networks to create realistic motion and depth in your videos.

items.title: Multiple Video Styles
items.description: From parallax effects to full 3D motion, Genie 3 offers various animation styles for every creative need.

items.title: Professional Results
items.description: Create broadcast-quality videos that rival expensive production studios, all powered by Genie 3 AI.

feature.name: feature
feature.title: Genie 3 AI Video Generation Features
feature.description: Advanced AI capabilities that make Genie 3 the leading image-to-video platform.

items.title: Smart Depth Detection
items.description: Genie 3's advanced AI instantly maps image depth layers, distinguishing foreground, midground, and background elements to generate lifelike 3D parallax effects—making static photos pop with realistic movement.

items.title: Multiple Animation Styles
items.description: From cinematic zooms for storytelling to smooth pans for product showcases, Genie 3 offers 12+ animation styles including parallax, rotate, and custom motion paths—tailored for social media, marketing, and professional videos.

items.title: HD & 4K Export
items.description: Export Genie 3 videos in studio-grade HD 1080p or ultra-sharp 4K 2160p resolution. All outputs are optimized for YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, and broadcast—preserving quality across every platform.

items.title: Batch Processing
items.description: Genie 3's AI-powered batch processing lets you animate up to 50 images in one go. Save hours with simultaneous rendering, consistent style application, and bulk export options.

items.title: Real-time Preview
items.description: See Genie 3's animations in real time with instant previews. Tweak speed, direction, or effects on the fly—no waiting for full renders to perfect your video.

items.title: Cloud-Powered AI
items.description: Genie 3's cloud-based AI infrastructure delivers 3x faster rendering than competitors. Access projects anytime, anywhere—with secure storage and seamless cross-device sync.

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: This section addresses common questions about Genie 3. We've compiled a list of the most frequent inquiries to provide you with quick and helpful answers about Genie 3 and our free Genie 3 service.

items.title: Is Genie 3 really free to use?
items.description: Yes, our core Genie 3 service is completely free. We offer a free Genie 3 plan that allows you to create high-quality videos without any cost. There are optional premium features for advanced users, but the main text-to-video functionality of Genie 3 is free. Our free Genie 3 plan is designed to be robust.

items.title: What is the maximum length of a video I can create with Genie 3?
items.description: The maximum video length with Genie 3 varies depending on your plan. The free Genie 3 plan has a generous limit, and our premium plans offer even longer video creation times. Check our pricing page for more details about Genie 3.

items.title: Can I use the videos I create with Genie 3 for commercial purposes?
items.description: Yes, videos created with Genie 3 can be used for commercial purposes. However, please review our terms of service for specific details on usage rights and attribution requirements. Our goal with Genie 3 is to be a versatile tool for everyone, including commercial users.

items.title: What kind of text prompts work best with Genie 3?
items.description: Genie 3 works best with clear, descriptive text prompts. Providing detailed information about the scene, characters, and desired tone will help our AI generate the best possible video. Experimenting is key to mastering Genie 3 and our free Genie 3 service.

items.title: Do I need any special software to use Genie 3?
items.description: No, Genie 3 is a completely web-based platform. You can access it from any modern web browser on your computer or mobile device. There's no need to download or install any software to use Genie 3.

items.title: How long does it take to generate a video with Genie 3?
items.description: Generation time depends on the length and complexity of your video. For short videos, it often takes just a few minutes. Our efficient Genie 3 engine is designed to minimize wait times, making Genie 3 incredibly fast.

items.title: Can I edit the videos after they are generated?
items.description: Yes, Genie 3 provides basic editing tools that allow you to make adjustments to your generated videos. You can trim clips, change music, and add text overlays to perfect your creation with Genie 3.

items.title: Is there a limit on the number of videos I can create?
items.description: The free Genie 3 plan includes a certain number of credits for video creation. You can create more videos by upgrading to a premium plan. We aim to provide a fair and generous free Genie 3 experience for all.

items.title: What languages does Genie 3 support?
items.description: Currently, Genie 3 supports multiple languages for text input and voiceovers. We are constantly adding new languages to our platform to make Genie 3 accessible to a global audience. The versatility of Genie 3 is a key feature.

items.title: How can I get help if I run into problems with Genie 3?
items.description: We offer a comprehensive help center with tutorials and FAQs. If you still need assistance, our support team is available to help. We are dedicated to ensuring a smooth and productive experience with Genie 3.
